txt.en: 'I can't believe they've taken him! We must hurry inside the Angar Aragín as well, before they torture him or attempt to sacrifice him to their dark lord.'
Speak with Razâl when you are ready to go

'You have my thanks, [placeholder]. To have two of my bravest - and most foolhardy - soldiers returned to me relatively unharmed is a boon I cannot repay.\n\n'This night did not happen as I had imagined, but still the Barkhûshim were weakened, their stores and defences depleted. Okhíso is as weak as he will ever be. Now is the time for us to strike.'
You must move quickly into Angar Aragín to save Numûru!
'We must rescue Numûru. There's not a moment to lose!'
Speak with Razâl outside the tower in Kûr Anzar when you are ready.
